text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your hard work! That's all for 
our training today.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
If you have any other questions or doubts, 
please check the “HELP” and “TIPS” menus that 
you can find when you press the “i” button.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
From now on, you'll spend your days here at 
the school, training your horsegirls.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Take on the Twinkle Series and make your 
horsegirls' dreams come true!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to your success 
as a trainer as well as the success 
of your horsegirls!
